# üî∞ NOW IN EARLY ACCESS! üî∞

Downtown Club is a **simcade** racing game with full virtual controls and exciting driving feedback, built from the ground up for standalone VR. Grab wheel, shifter and handbrake, take full control of your car and become a motorsport champion!

üèÅ **GAME MODES**
- Events: win thematic competitions to unlock content
- Custom Race: play with completely personalized settings
- Time Attack: improve your lap times and join the online leaderboards
- Free Drive: take a break and explore the map freely

üöó **LAUNCH FEATURES**
- Three hatchback cars, each one in Standard and Sport version
- A rich city environment with freeways, tunnels and parkings
- Different racetrack layout combinations, all available in reverse 
- Create customized opponents with individual behaviors and preferences
- Mix and match different suit skins and car paints
- Virtual and thumbstick controls, many gameplay and comfort settings
- Compatible with bHaptics TactSuit

üì¢ **UPCOMING FREE UPDATES**
- Online multiplayer with public and private rooms
- New cars and maps inspired by automotive and motorsport icons
- Time attack ghosts, replays, localizations and much more!

changelog.change_log:
- Fixed rare issues that caused the game to close
- Fixed right-side dashboard of the Griffe3 Sport rendering on the wrong side

- Improved stability of all cars
- Improved brake power of all cars
- Improved online leaderboard reliability
- Temporarily reduced opponents difficulty in Events by 20%
- Increased speed penalty for wall-running
- Added lap invalidation for wall-running in Time Attack
- Added new HUD info messages during races
- Added an option to disable HUD entirely
- Updated dashboard color theme of Sport cars
- Fixed wrong speedometers in Sport cars
- Fixed wrong prizes in certain Events
- Lots of smaller updates and fixes
